channel.title: Whonix 11 hardware gateway terminal only
channel.description:
Hi guys
as my first post I'd love to congratulate the team behind Whonix. Well done!
Now, I'm trying to build the 11.0.0.3.0-testers-only as a terminal only gateway with hardware isolation.
I cannot by the live of me get the --terminal-only option in the build command. Is it supported?! It exists in the documentation but the build script errors out when I use it!
Any ideas? Has anyone done it?
Cheers guys!

item.title: Whonix 11 hardware gateway terminal only
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Changed to:
–gui none

Updated in documentation.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 11 hardware gateway terminal only
item.dc:creator: JBapt
item.description:
Hi guys

as my first post I’d love to congratulate the team behind Whonix. Well done!

Now, I’m trying to build the 11.0.0.3.0-testers-only as a terminal only gateway with hardware isolation.

I cannot by the live of me get the --terminal-only option in the build command. Is it supported?! It exists in the documentation but the build script errors out when I use it!

Any ideas? Has anyone done it?

Cheers guys!
